ygData.subject: Re: [EQ_Necromancer] Dagger or Staff?
ygData.msgSnippet: I don t know about that. The higher level you get the more of the annoying green trash you have to deal with. I personally use a staff of writhing, and I use
ygData.messageBody:
I don't know about that. The higher level you get the
more of the annoying green trash you have to deal
with. I personally use a staff of writhing, and I use
it fairly frequently. (I love the graphics of the
process going of for 48 pts of damage). Admittedly,
the majority of time that you will be hunting for exp
you will not use the skill, but the higher level you
get, the more "down" time between killing things for
experience you have.

Darkmoon Somberlight

--- Naeeldar <jackal@...> wrote:
> Whatever skill the best weapon you can lay your hand
> on at your level is
> what you should go with. Truth is by level 20 or so
> you'll probably stop
> meleeing and by 25 your probably done with it
> forever for the most part.
>
> Naeeldar K'Valle Level 50 Dark Elf Necromancer
>
> -----Original Message-----
> From: Marlon Clark <marlonclark@...>

> Subject: [EQ_Necromancer] Dagger or Staff?
>
>
> >From: "Marlon Clark" <marlonclark@...>
> >

> >Hi,
> >
> >I was wondering if anybody has any
> >recommendations on which weapon a dark elven
> >necromancer should use. I've used dagger
> >so far, but have tried the 1H staff and
> >like the better damage. Any thoughts?
> >
> >Marlon
